parameters.query:
select c.nome, c.telefone, d.`data`
from datas_agendadas as d
join conversas as c
on d.conversas_telefone = c.telefone
where d.status = 'ativo'
  and DATE(d.`data`) = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY);
